com.esri.mo2.map.dpy
Interface OSBFactory

public interface OSBFactory

Creates an off-screen buffer (OSB) image, that is, an image that can have a graphics context (Graphics).

In JDK 1.0 and JDK 1.1, only a Component can create an OSB via its createImage(int,int) method. But at JDK 1.2, an OSB can also be created via a new BufferedImage(). You would want to do this if you want to create a server application that could render maps, but without a requirement for a graphics display.

When creating a Display, you must specify an OSBFactorythat the Display can use to create a new OSB whenever the Display size changes.

Method Summary
 BufferedImage createImage(int w, int h)
          Creates an offscreen buffer image.
